attributes.action: stop coventry council and all councils overcharging and sending summons before christmas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is to show the views of all. please sign and support to show we all can unite as one. sigh this if you want the councils to reduce tax and stop sending summons before Christmas to people who have always worked and struggling to make ends meet. sign this to give the working man / woman a break. the pensioner who will not turn the heating up because they have to fund a shocking council tax bill. Sign to support those alone raising a family. sign to stop overspending and fat cat pay deals. Sign this to show all ENOUGH IS ENOUGH.
